meanings.definition: A member of a North American Indian people of western New York.
meanings.sent1: The Senecas lived in western New York.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the Senecas in history class.
meanings.sent3: The Senecas had a big celebration with dancing and singing.
meanings.sent4: The Senecas were like a close-knit family, always supporting each other.
meanings.sent5: The Senecas' traditions were passed down through generations.

meanings.sent1: He enjoyed smoking a Senecas cigar after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of Senecas cigars on display.
meanings.sent3: She joked that smoking a Senecas cigar made her feel sophisticated.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the Senecas cigar filled the room with a rich scent.
meanings.sent5: The Senecas cigar had a smooth flavor that he savored.
